hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e # Source folder containing the scripts source_scripts_folder="${JENKINS_HOME}/workspace/Bash_Functions/" ls -la "$source_scripts_folder"
# Iterate through the files in the folder and source them for script_file in "$source_scripts_folder"*.sh; do chmod +x "$script_file" if [ -f "$script_file" ] && [ -x "$script_file" ]; then echo "sourcing $script_file" source "$script_file" fi done
assume_role # Deregister previous staging from staging TG (remove green from green) target_group_vpc=$(get_target_group_vpc_by_tg_name $staging_tg_name) staging_target_group_arn=$(get_target_group_arn_by_name "$staging_tg_name") staging_httpd_instance_prv_ips=($(get_private_ip_by_tags "staging_httpd_tags_file.json")) # json generated in previous build step.
if [ -z "${staging_httpd_instance_prv_ips}" ]; then echo "No private IPs found. No Staging Ips to deregister" else echo "Deregistering staging target(s) before teardown." deregister_targets "$target_group_vpc" "$staging_target_group_arn" "${staging_httpd_instance_prv_ips[@]}" wait_for_target_group_health "$staging_target_group_arn" "UNUSED" "${staging_httpd_instance_prv_ips[@]}" fi
reset_role

#!/bin/bash set -e # Source folder containing the scripts source_scripts_folder="${JENKINS_HOME}/workspace/Bash_Functions/" ls -la "$source_scripts_folder"
# Iterate through the files in the folder and source them for script_file in "$source_scripts_folder"*.sh; do chmod +x "$script_file" if [ -f "$script_file" ] && [ -x "$script_file" ]; then echo "sourcing $script_file" source "$script_file" fi done
echo "pic-sure introspection token" # if picsure_token_introspection_token is not defined already create one if [ -z $picsure_token_introspection_token ]; then echo "No introspection given. Generating new one." create_jwt_token $picsure_client_secret "$pic_sure_introspection_token_repo" "PSAMA_APPLICATION|$application_id_for_base_query" "${duration_int:-365}" "${duration_unit:-day}" picsure_token_introspection_token="${CREATE_JWT_TOKEN_OUTPUT}" echo "introspection token generated." else echo "Using introspection token defined by global properties" fi
# Destroy and Build resources cd app-infrastructure
# TODO - Needs backend state management. aws s3 cp s3://$stack_s3_bucket/deployment_state_metadata/${target_stack}/terraform.tfstate . || echo "bad state or doesnt exist, it will be created"
# Assume deployment role assume_role
# Perform RDS Strategy do_picsure_rds_strategy "${picsure_rds_strategy}" "${live_stack}" "${env_project}" picsure_rds_snapshot_id=$(get_latest_rds_snapshot_id "${picsure_rds_strategy}" "${live_stack}" "${env_project}")
terraform init if $isDestroyOnly; then
terraform destroy -auto-approve \ -var="dataset_s3_object_key=${dataset_s3_object_key}" \ -var="destigmatized_dataset_s3_object_key=${destigmatized_dataset_s3_object_key}" \ -var="genomic_dataset_s3_object_key=${genomic_dataset_s3_object_key}" \ -var="target_stack=${target_stack}" \ -var="picsure_rds_snapshot_id=${picsure_rds_snapshot_id}" \ -var="stack_githash=`echo ${deployment_git_hash} |cut -c1-7`" \ -var="stack_githash_long=${deployment_git_hash}" \ -var="env_public_dns_name=${env_public_dns_name}" \ -var="env_public_dns_name_staging=${env_public_dns_name_staging}" \ -var="env_private_dns_name=${env_private_dns_name}" \ -var="env_hosted_zone_id=${env_hosted_zone_id}" \ -var="analytics_id=${analytics_id}" \ -var="tag_manager_id=${tag_manager_id}" \ -var="env_is_open_access=${env_is_open_access}" \ -var="include_auth_hpds=${include_auth_hpds}" \ -var="include_open_hpds=${include_open_hpds}" \ -var="environment_name=${environment_name}" \ -var="env_staging_subdomain=${env_staging_subdomain}" \ -var="application_id_for_base_query=${application_id_for_base_query}" \ -var="stack_s3_bucket=${stack_s3_bucket}" \ -var="idp_provider=${idp_provider}" \ -var="env_project=${env_project}" \ -var="picsure_token_introspection_token=${picsure_token_introspection_token}" \ -var="picsure_client_secret=${picsure_client_secret}" \ -var="fence_client_id=${fence_client_id}" \ -var="fence_client_secret=${fence_client_secret}" \ -var="idp_provider_uri=${idp_provider_uri}" \ -var="client_id=${client_id}" \ -var="sp_client_secret=${sp_client_secret}" \ -var="login_link=${login_link}" \ -var="connection_id=${connection_id}" \ -var="connection_label=${connection_label}" \ -var="connection_sub_prefix=${connection_sub_prefix}" \ -var="pdf_link=${pdf_link}" \ -var="help_link=${help_link}" || true
reset_role
# Move to terraform backend aws s3 cp terraform.tfstate s3://$stack_s3_bucket/deployment_state_metadata/${target_stack}/terraform.tfstate
else terraform destroy -auto-approve \ -var="dataset_s3_object_key=${dataset_s3_object_key}" \ -var="destigmatized_dataset_s3_object_key=${destigmatized_dataset_s3_object_key}" \ -var="genomic_dataset_s3_object_key=${genomic_dataset_s3_object_key}" \ -var="target_stack=${target_stack}" \ -var="picsure_rds_snapshot_id=${picsure_rds_snapshot_id}" \ -var="stack_githash=`echo ${deployment_git_hash} |cut -c1-7`" \ -var="stack_githash_long=${deployment_git_hash}" \ -var="env_public_dns_name=${env_public_dns_name}" \ -var="env_public_dns_name_staging=${env_public_dns_name_staging}" \ -var="env_private_dns_name=${env_private_dns_name}" \ -var="env_hosted_zone_id=${env_hosted_zone_id}" \ -var="analytics_id=${analytics_id}" \ -var="tag_manager_id=${tag_manager_id}" \ -var="env_is_open_access=${env_is_open_access}" \ -var="include_auth_hpds=${include_auth_hpds}" \ -var="include_open_hpds=${include_open_hpds}" \ -var="environment_name=${environment_name}" \ -var="env_staging_subdomain=${env_staging_subdomain}" \ -var="application_id_for_base_query=${application_id_for_base_query}" \ -var="stack_s3_bucket=${stack_s3_bucket}" \ -var="idp_provider=${idp_provider}" \ -var="env_project=${env_project}" \ -var="picsure_token_introspection_token=${picsure_token_introspection_token}" \ -var="picsure_client_secret=${picsure_client_secret}" \ -var="fence_client_id=${fence_client_id}" \ -var="fence_client_secret=${fence_client_secret}" \ -var="idp_provider_uri=${idp_provider_uri}" \ -var="client_id=${client_id}" \ -var="sp_client_secret=${sp_client_secret}" \ -var="login_link=${login_link}" \ -var="connection_id=${connection_id}" \ -var="connection_label=${connection_label}" \ -var="connection_sub_prefix=${connection_sub_prefix}" \ -var="pdf_link=${pdf_link}" \ -var="help_link=${help_link}" || true
terraform apply -auto-approve \ -var="dataset_s3_object_key=${dataset_s3_object_key}" \ -var="destigmatized_dataset_s3_object_key=${destigmatized_dataset_s3_object_key}" \ -var="genomic_dataset_s3_object_key=${genomic_dataset_s3_object_key}" \ -var="target_stack=${target_stack}" \ -var="picsure_rds_snapshot_id=${picsure_rds_snapshot_id}" \ -var="stack_githash=`echo ${deployment_git_hash} |cut -c1-7`" \ -var="stack_githash_long=${deployment_git_hash}" \ -var="env_public_dns_name=${env_public_dns_name}" \ -var="env_public_dns_name_staging=${env_public_dns_name_staging}" \ -var="env_private_dns_name=${env_private_dns_name}" \ -var="env_hosted_zone_id=${env_hosted_zone_id}" \ -var="analytics_id=${analytics_id}" \ -var="tag_manager_id=${tag_manager_id}" \ -var="env_is_open_access=${env_is_open_access}" \ -var="include_auth_hpds=${include_auth_hpds}" \ -var="include_open_hpds=${include_open_hpds}" \ -var="environment_name=${environment_name}" \ -var="env_staging_subdomain=${env_staging_subdomain}" \ -var="application_id_for_base_query=${application_id_for_base_query}" \ -var="stack_s3_bucket=${stack_s3_bucket}" \ -var="idp_provider=${idp_provider}" \ -var="env_project=${env_project}" \ -var="picsure_token_introspection_token=${picsure_token_introspection_token}" \ -var="picsure_client_secret=${picsure_client_secret}" \ -var="fence_client_id=${fence_client_id}" \ -var="fence_client_secret=${fence_client_secret}" \ -var="idp_provider_uri=${idp_provider_uri}" \ -var="client_id=${client_id}" \ -var="sp_client_secret=${sp_client_secret}" \ -var="login_link=${login_link}" \ -var="connection_id=${connection_id}" \ -var="connection_label=${connection_label}" \ -var="connection_sub_prefix=${connection_sub_prefix}" \ -var="pdf_link=${pdf_link}" \ -var="help_link=${help_link}" || true
reset_role
# Move to terraform backend # If script fails before state file is uploaded to s3 state will be lost for created objects \ # terraform destroy will not destroy anything as it points to old state and apply will fail as objects may already exist # Will have to manually destroy and delete roles, ec2s, etc. in that scenario aws s3 cp terraform.tfstate s3://$stack_s3_bucket/deployment_state_metadata/${target_stack}/terraform.tfstate # roles are now in the same state as their related resources.. #aws s3 cp ../s3-deployment-roles/terraform.tfstate s3://$stack_s3_bucket/deployment_state_metadata/${target_stack}/terraform.tfstate_roles
# These files are uploaded to s3 because user-scripts download them. The user scripts are already running # so this is a race condition at this point as terraform has been applied # have terraform provision these to the ec2 and remove the aws cli stuff from the user-scripts and here aws s3 --sse=AES256 cp picsureui-settings.json s3://$stack_s3_bucket/configs/jenkins_pipeline_build_${deployment_git_hash}/picsureui_settings.json aws s3 --sse=AES256 cp configs/banner_config.json s3://$stack_s3_bucket/configs/jenkins_pipeline_build_${deployment_git_hash}/banner_config.json aws s3 --sse=AES256 cp standalone.xml s3://$stack_s3_bucket/configs/jenkins_pipeline_build_${deployment_git_hash}/standalone.xml aws s3 --sse=AES256 cp pic-sure-schema.sql s3://$stack_s3_bucket/configs/jenkins_pipeline_build_${deployment_git_hash}/pic-sure-schema.sql aws s3 --sse=AES256 cp resources-registration.sql s3://$stack_s3_bucket/configs/jenkins_pipeline_build_${deployment_git_hash}/resources-registration.sql aws s3 --sse=AES256 cp httpd-vhosts.conf s3://$stack_s3_bucket/configs/jenkins_pipeline_build_${deployment_git_hash}/httpd-vhosts.conf aws s3 --sse=AES256 cp aggregate-resource.properties s3://$stack_s3_bucket/configs/jenkins_pipeline_build_${deployment_git_hash}/aggregate-resource.properties aws s3 --sse=AES256 cp visualization-resource.properties s3://$stack_s3_bucket/configs/jenkins_pipeline_build_${deployment_git_hash}/visualization-resource.properties
fi
